subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Notre Dame will play top-seeded Kentucky in a round of 8 matchup that will be just one more challenge in what have been some of the most trying days of Irish Coach Mike Brey’s life.
snippet: Notre Dame will play top-seeded Kentucky in a round of 8 matchup that will be just one more challenge in what have been some of the most trying days of Irish Coach Mike Brey’s life.
